summary: A romantic weekend turns horrific and sadistic when Sadie discovers her boyfriend is having an affair with her best friend.
cast: Billy Zane|AnnaLynne McCord|Viva Bianca|Doug Drucker|Marian Weage|Jim Midock|Juan-Pablo Veizaga|Scott Knisley|Martin Sprock|Sadie Katz|Denise Glass|Nathan R. Wheeler|Brooklynn Brokaw|Joe Kurak|Christopher Maggio|Mark Jones|Bootsie|Victoria Davidoff|Alivia Haines|Rich Grosso|Xan Aspero
title: Despreciada
